data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Belenenses push upfield but Tiago Martins quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Free kick Belenenses.
Tiago Martins signals a Belenenses throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 9, Belenenses to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Boavista.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Boavista to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Boavista have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Caue has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Belenenses's Henrique has been booked in Porto.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 18, Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Boavista.
Throw-in Belenenses.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 20, Tiago Martins signals a Belenenses throw-in in Boavista's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Boavista's area.
In the minute 22, Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
Belenenses's Ruben Lima misses with an attempt on goal.
Tiago Martins awards Boavista a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Boavista.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Miguel Cardoso (Belenenses) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 29, Belenenses have a dangerous throw-in.
Belenenses are pushing forward but Henrique's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Belenenses advance rapidly upfield but Tiago Martins blows for offside.
In the minute 37, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Tiago Martins waits before resuming play because Chidozie Awaziem for Boavista is still down.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Chidozie Awaziem for Boavista is back on the field again.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Boavista.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 48, Boavista pushes forward through Gustavo Sauer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Phete gets his shot on target but fails to score for Belenenses.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Boavista in Porto.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Boavista are coming forward and Ricardo Mangas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tiago Martins awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
The away team have replaced Caue with Sphephelo Sithole. This is the first substitution made today by Petit.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
In the minute 61, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silvestre Varela (Belenenses) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Belenenses are caught offside.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 66, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista are whistled for offside.
In the minute 68, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Belenenses's Miguel Cardoso breaks free at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Nathan is replacing Nuno Valente Santos for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 73, In Porto Belenenses drive forward through Silvestre Varela. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 74, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Afonso Sousa of Belenenses gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
In the minute 79, Vasco Seabra (Boavista) is making a second substitution, with Jeriel De Santis replacing Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 80, Gustavo Sauer gets his shot on target but fails to score for Boavista.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Boavista.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista drives forward and Nathan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Belenenses make their second substitution with Richard Rodrigues replacing Silvestre Varela.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Belenenses.
Javi Garcia (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In the minute 88, Ricardo Mangas (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gustavo Sauer of Boavista smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Boavista close to the penalty box.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Porto.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruno Ramires has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto.
Tiago Martins awards Belenenses a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Javi Garcia for Boavista has been booked by Tiago Martins and receives a first yellow card.
Miguel Cardoso (Belenenses) has received a first yellow card.
The match at Estadio do Bessa XXI has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bruno Ramires, who is down injured.
Petit is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Mateo Cassierra replacing Miguel Cardoso.
The home team have replaced Angel Gomes with Musa Juwara. This is the third substitution made today by Vasco Seabra.
